name: K.P.I. (BE: Kind)
description:
K.P.I.  (BE: Kind)

Welcome to your first day in your new job!

E-Corp Games Inc. cares about you and rewards kindness.

Interact with your coworkers to exchange Kindness Performance Indicators.

Increase the overall kindness level to please The Boss.

Be careful though, not everyone is as sincere and kind-hearted as you are.

Penalties and taxes may apply.
All rights reversed.
Without prejudice.
